name: Neeyamo
description: In February 2009, Neeyamo was formed with a mission to leverage technology, innovation, and ingenuity to help multinational organizations efficiently support their global employee population. As a technology-first company, Neeyamo was always concerned with optimizing employee experience while minimizing employee intervention. With the understanding that accuracy increases multifold with fewer human fingers on things, NeeyamoWorks was born.

enhanced_description: Neeyamo, established in 2009, is a technology-first HR solutions provider designed to assist multinational organizations in efficiently supporting their global employee populations. The company's core mission revolves around leveraging technology and innovation to optimize employee experience while minimizing human intervention, aiming for increased accuracy. Neeyamo offers a comprehensive, intuitive solution for the complexities of global payroll, ensuring compliance with ever-changing global and local regulations. Its product suite, NeeyamoWorks, includes a single engine for global payroll processing (Global Payroll Core), extended capabilities for ancillary payroll requirements (Global Payroll Plus), and a portfolio of products for effective onboarding and management of international employees (Global Employee Management). Additionally, Neeyamo provides solutions in recruiting, specifically for pre-employment screening and background checks, with the objective of reducing the overall cost of hiring qualified employees.
